review: Very good doctor. Good advice and very caring and friendly person.  Very impressed with treatment and medicine.

I had excellent experience with Dr. L. Krishna, during my tenure in NIMS as Executive Registrar. He takes most care towards the patients. I used to take the feedback from the patients as Registrar about the doctors. Most of the patients expressed their utmost satisfaction. Even after my retirement from NIMS I referred quite a no of patients to him. He has taken utmost care towards the patients. He listens to the patients coolly, keenly and gives suitable advice and treats with less medication. While treating the patient he will always be cheerful and looks the patient as one of his family members. Patient need a cardial behavior by the doctor. This sort of treatment/conduct gives more confidence and satisfaction among the patients. This sort of cardial behavior with the patients is very much in Dr. L. Krishna. He is having excellent experience in treating the cardiac patients. I have no hesitation in strongly recommending Dr. L. Krishna for cardiac treatment.
patient_name: M Sudershanam, Formerly Executive Registrar NIMS

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I took my aunty for a Cardiac check up when the family had to take a call on a Procedure suggested  by their family doctor. Since the procedure is a sensitive one with regards to its success, post complications & cost.  Dr. Lanka Krishna garu been recommended by one of our well wishers who is a very senior  professional Cardiothoracic Surgeon.
Dr. Lanka Krishna is very Sr. Cardiologist **** ********* ********** He heard very patiently all  her problems. Visited her case reports in detail.  Explained the sensitivities with the procedure.  He ruled out the need to perform the procedure & assured her of full  recovery with medicines.  He is very genuine & works for the benefit of the patients. After meeting him , the patient's courage gone up & all her problems appeared cleared mostly even before medicines started.  Very good doctor, with his knowledge, patient friendly behavior  adding value to the reputation of  Aster Prime Hospital, Ameerpet, Hyderabad. ********************************

Sir has great subject experience to explain clearly. We have inter action with him since 20 years. He very keenly explain the Issue and guides patients for better treatment. Very crispy and crystal clear in taking decisions. He is very principled and respect values.

I have visited Dr Lanka Krishna gaaru for pain in left side of the chest. He patiently heard about my previous medical condition, and gave his suggestions. Diagnosed my left part of heart and prescribed the medication as necessary and suggested health tips to make the health conditions stable.

I Srinivas, my Father is given treatment by Dr. Lanka Krishna.
He is very experienced, kind, a very good listener, and down to earth person. He never gets irritated and supported us .
He always responds to our call and helped us. A great doctor with helping nature . It‚Äôs been 04 years and we never felt that we were visiting a doctor , he made us feel like family.
We thank him for all the support and care.üôè

With my experience with dr L krishna I can surely say that he's a good listener, he listens to our problems so patiently and he can be easily approached and he responds very well to his patients.
My overall experience with Dr is excellent and I would refer him to my friend and family.
Doctor Lanka Krishna garu is a very pleasant personality.  He was very clear in his treatment and me and my wife are very happy with our visit.
My wife suffering with left hand pain ..for doubting of cardiac problem consulted to doctor...the way he interact with us and friendly ness awesome ........

The doctor was friendly and patiently heard the issue. Also was very clear in his opinion. I appreciate the fact that he was in the lab when the personnel was perfoming the 2D echo and checked the scan online.
Very good doctor. Good advice and very caring and friendly person.  Very impressed with treatment and medicine.

I had excellent experience with Dr. L. Krishna, during my tenure in NIMS as Executive Registrar. He takes most care towards the patients. I used to take the feedback from the patients as Registrar about the doctors. Most of the patients expressed their utmost satisfaction. Even after my retirement from NIMS I referred quite a no of patients to him. He has taken utmost care towards the patients. He listens to the patients coolly, keenly and gives suitable advice and treats with less medication. While treating the patient he will always be cheerful and looks the patient as one of his family members. Patient need a cardial behavior by the doctor. This sort of treatment/conduct gives more confidence and satisfaction among the patients. This sort of cardial behavior with the patients is very much in Dr. L. Krishna. He is having excellent experience in treating the cardiac patients. I have no hesitation in strongly recommending Dr. L. Krishna for cardiac treatment.
